sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-toolbar>
          <v-toolbar-title>Piscícola</v-toolbar-title>
          <v-autocomplete
            class="mx-1"
            flat
            hide-no-data
            hide-details
            label="Seleccionar"
            solo-inverted
          ></v-autocomplete>

          <v-btn-toggle>
            <v-btn outlined class="mx-auto">
              <v-icon @click="showDialogCreatePiscicola = true">fa-plus</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn outlined class="mx-auto">
              <v-icon @click="showDialogDeletePiscicola = true">fa-trash-alt</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn outlined class="mx-auto">
              <v-icon @click="showDialogEditPiscicola = true">fa-edit</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </v-btn-toggle>
        </v-toolbar>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-toolbar>
          <v-toolbar-title>Estanque</v-toolbar-title>
          <v-autocomplete
            cache-items
            class="mx-1"
            flat
            hide-no-data
            hide-details
            label="Seleccionar"
            solo-inverted
          ></v-autocomplete>

          <v-btn-toggle>
            <v-btn outlined class="mx-auto">
              <v-icon @click="showDialogCreateEstanque = true">fa-plus</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn outlined class="mx-auto">
              <v-icon @click="showDialogDeleteEstanque = true">fa-trash-alt</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn outlined class="mx-auto">
              <v-icon @click="showDialogEditEstanque = true">fa-edit</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </v-btn-toggle>
        </v-toolbar>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="6">
        <v-btn color="#325d79" outlined @click="showDialogCreateSensor = true">Crear Sensor</v-btn>
      </v-col>
      <v-col class="mx-auto" cols="6">
        <v-text-field
          v-model="search"
          label="Buscar Sensor"
          outlined
          dense
          prepend-inner-icon="fa-search"
        ></v-text-field>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-data-table :headers="headers" :items="sensors" :search="search" class="elevation-5">
          <template v-slot:top>
            <v-toolbar flat color="#325d79" dark>
              <v-toolbar-title>Sensores Registrados</v-toolbar-title>
              <v-divider class="mx-4" inset vertical></v-divider>
              <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            </v-toolbar>
          </template>
          <template v-slot:item.actions="{}">
            <v-icon @click="showDialogDeleteSensor = true">fa-trash-alt</v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-data-table>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>

    <DialogCreate title="Crear Piscícola" variable="Piscícola" v-model="showDialogCreatePiscicola" />
    <DialogCreate title="Crear Estanque" variable="Estanque" v-model="showDialogCreateEstanque" />
    <DialogCreate title="Crear Sensor" variable="Sensor" v-model="showDialogCreateSensor" />

    <DialogCreate title="Editar Piscícola" variable="Piscícola" v-model="showDialogEditPiscicola" />
    <DialogCreate title="Editar Estanque" variable="Estanque" v-model="showDialogEditEstanque" />

    <DialogDelete
      title="Piscícola"
      :value="showDialogDeletePiscicola"
      @input="v => (showDialogDeletePiscicola = v)"
    />
    <DialogDelete title="Estanque" variable="Sensor" v-model="showDialogDeleteEstanque" />
    <DialogDelete title="Sensor" variable="Sensor" v-model="showDialogDeleteSensor" />
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import DialogDelete from "@/components/DialogDelete.vue";
import DialogCreate from "@/components/DialogCreate.vue";
export default {
  components: {
    DialogDelete,
    DialogCreate
  },
  data() {
    return {
      search: "",
      showDialogCreateEstanque: false,
      showDialogCreatePiscicola: false,
      showDialogDeleteEstanque: false,
      showDialogDeletePiscicola: false,
      showDialogDeleteSensor: false,
      showDialogCreateSensor: false,
      showDialogEditPiscicola: false,
      showDialogEditEstanque: false,
      headers: [
        {
          text: "Sensor",
          value: "nombre_sensor"
        },
        {
          text: "Unidad de medida",
          value: "medida"
        },
        {
          text: "Descripción",
          sortable: false,
          value: "descripción"
        },
        {
          text: "Acción",
          sortable: false,
          value: "actions"
        }
      ],
      sensors: [
        {
          nombre_sensor: "Sensor Temperatura",
          medida: "Grado Celsius (°C)"
        },
        {
          nombre_sensor: "Sensor Oxigeno Disuelto",
          medida: "mg/L "
        }
      ]
    };
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped></style>
